content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5) connected to a pipe group.

### Steam engine at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5) connected to an electric pole (position -27.5, 29.5).

### Boiler at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -18.0, -49.0) connected to a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) with coal as fuel.

### Lab at position(unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position unknown) currently not powered.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting steam engine to power
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to a power network and that it has a valid input liquid to function.

### Errors when trying to access non-existent entities
- Verify the positions of entities before attempting to access them to avoid errors related to non-existent entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
